info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 13 at 4:00PM EDT until May 13 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CHESTERFIELD...CENTRAL AMELIA AND SOUTHERN POWHATAN COUNTIES... At 400 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ballsville, or 8 miles southwest of Powhatan, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Amelia Courthouse around 420 PM EDT. Chula around 425 PM EDT. Scotts Fork around 430 PM EDT. Moseley around 435 PM EDT. Mannboro around 445 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Skinquarter, Pilkinton, Belona, Holly Hills, Lodore, Truxillo, Giles Mill, Clayville, Winterham and Genito. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
